comments:
eclipse build 200405270800

Could not replicate. Tried several times. I am including the steps, and the 
stack trace, so that you know that this situation can happen somehow.

Here are the steps that I did:

Uncheck Project->Build Automatically.
Project->Clean...
In the dialog, say "Clean all projects" and make sure "Start a Build 
Automatically" is checked.
Say OK and get an "Operation in Progress" dialog.
Wait until the operation starts, then click "Run in Background".
While the build is running, Window->Preferences...PDE-Target Platform.
Click the "Browse..." button for Location.
Click around on a bunch of directories (a dozen or so), then click Cancel.
Cancel the Preferences dialog.

At this point, I had an error dialog waiting for me, saying there was a stack 
trace in the .log. Here's the stack trace.

Fixed.
